title: Basque-style cod with peppers
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, halved and thinly sliced', '2 large red peppers, thinly sliced into short strips', '2 large green peppers thinly sliced into short strips', '2 sprigs of fresh oregano', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '400g large ripe tomatoes, diced', '50g stoned black olives, halved', '1 tsp sugar', 'good pinch of chilli powder', '1 tbsp wine vinegar', '400g skinless thick cod fillet', '30g flat-leaf parsley, chopped']
